verses.verse: וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <S%H6950><s%> vai-yik-Ka-ha-Lu assembled together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- the whole עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat And the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> shi-Loh, at Shiloh וַיַּשְׁכִּ֥ינוּ <S%H7931><s%> vai-yash-Ki-nu and set up שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> 'O-hel the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz there And the land נִכְבְּשָׁ֖ה <S%H3533><s%> nich-be-Shah was subdued לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. before

וַיִּוָּֽתְרוּ֙ <S%H3498><s%> vai-yiv-va-te-Ru And there remained בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> biv-Nei among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- had not חָלְק֖וּ <S%H2505><s%> chal-Ku which had not yet received אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַֽחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam; their inheritance שִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven שְׁבָטִֽים׃ <S%H7626><s%> she-va-Tim. tribes

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- long אָ֙נָה֙ <S%H575><s%> 'a-nah How אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem will you מִתְרַפִּ֔ים <S%H7503><s%> mit-rap-Pim, How long [are] ye slack לָבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo to go לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> la-Re-shet to possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan hath given לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-Vo-tei-Chem. of your fathers

הָב֥וּ <S%H3051><s%> ha-Vu Give out לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah from among you three אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men לַשָּׁ֑בֶט <S%H7626><s%> lash-Sha-vet; for [each] tribe וְאֶשְׁלָחֵ֗ם <S%H7971><s%> ve-'esh-la-Chem, and I will send וְיָקֻ֜מוּ <S%H6965><s%> ve-ya-Ku-mu them and they shall rise וְיִֽתְהַלְּכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> ve-yit-hal-le-Chu and go בָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz through the land וְיִכְתְּב֥וּ <S%H3789><s%> ve-yich-te-Vu and describe אוֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah לְפִ֥י <S%H6310><s%> le-Fi it according נַֽחֲלָתָ֖ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam to the inheritance וְיָבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> ve-ya-Vo-'u of them and they shall come אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. about

וְהִֽתְחַלְּק֥וּ <S%H2505><s%> ve-hit-chal-le-Ku And they shall divide אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לְשִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> le-shiv-'Ah it into seven חֲלָקִ֑ים <S%H2506><s%> cha-la-Kim; parts יְהוּדָ֞ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah יַעֲמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> ya-'a-Mod shall abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and גְּבוּלוֹ֙ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lo in their coast מִנֶּ֔גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev, on the south וּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> u-Veit and the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph יַעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du shall abide עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in גְּבוּלָ֖ם <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lam in their coasts מִצָּפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon. on the north

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem You תִּכְתְּב֤וּ <S%H3789><s%> tich-te-Vu Ye shall therefore describe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah [into] seven חֲלָקִ֔ים <S%H2506><s%> cha-la-Kim, parts וַֽהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> va-ha-ve-Tem and bring אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah; here וְיָרִ֨יתִי <S%H3384><s%> ve-ya-Ri-ti [the description] hither to me that I may cast לָכֶ֤ם la-Chem גּוֹרָל֙ <S%H1486><s%> go-Ral lots פֹּ֔ה <S%H6311><s%> Poh, here לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei for you here before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. our God

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki because אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- have חֵ֤לֶק <S%H2506><s%> Che-lek have no part לַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> lal-vi-Yim But the Levites בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֔ם <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-be-Chem, among כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because כְהֻנַּ֥ת <S%H3550><s%> che-hun-Nat you for the priesthood יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-To; [is] their inheritance וְגָ֡ד <S%H1410><s%> ve-Gad and Gad וּרְאוּבֵ֡ן <S%H7205><s%> u-re-'u-Ven and Reuben וַחֲצִי֩ <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and half שֵׁ֨בֶט <S%H7626><s%> She-vet the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> ham-nash-Sheh of Manasseh לָקְח֣וּ <S%H3947><s%> la-ke-Chu have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Tam, their inheritance מֵעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> me-'E-ver beyond לַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> lai-yar-Den Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> miz-Ra-chah, on the east אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan gave לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh which Moses עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיָּקֻ֥מוּ <S%H6965><s%> vai-ya-Ku-mu arose הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-Le-chu; them that went וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav charged יְהוֹשֻׁ֡עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַהֹלְכִים֩ <S%H1980><s%> ha-ho-le-Chim and walk לִכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> lich-To to describe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying לְ֠כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Le-chu Go וְהִתְהַלְּכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> ve-hit-hal-le-Chu and walk בָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz through the land וְכִתְב֤וּ <S%H3789><s%> ve-chit-Vu and describe אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-Tah וְשׁ֣וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-Shu-vu it and come again אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, for וּ֠פֹה <S%H6311><s%> U-foh here אַשְׁלִ֨יךְ <S%H7993><s%> 'ash-Lich to me that I may here cast לָכֶ֥ם la-Chem גּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> go-Ral lots לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei for you before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <S%H7887><s%> be-shi-Loh. in Shiloh

וַיֵּלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim And the men וַיַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru and passed through בָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> va-'A-retz, the land וַיִּכְתְּב֧וּהָ <S%H3789><s%> vai-yich-te-Vu-ha and described לֶֽעָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> le-'a-Rim it by cities לְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7651><s%> le-shiv-'Ah into seven חֲלָקִ֖ים <S%H2506><s%> cha-la-Kim parts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֑פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer; in a book וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' [again] to Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh to the host שִׁלֹֽה׃ <S%H7887><s%> shi-Loh. at Shiloh

וַיַּשְׁלֵךְ֩ <S%H7993><s%> vai-yash-leCh cast לָהֶ֨ם la-Hem יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' And Joshua גּוֹרָ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> go-Ral lots בְּשִׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> be-shi-Loh for them in Shiloh לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD וַיְחַלֶּק־ <S%H2505><s%> vay-chal-lek- divided שָׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' and there Joshua אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz the land לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כְּמַחְלְקֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4256><s%> ke-mach-le-ko-Tam. according to their divisions פ Peh

וַיַּ֗עַל <S%H5927><s%> vai-Ya-'al, came up גּוֹרַ֛ל <S%H1486><s%> go-Ral And the lot מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> mat-Teh of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the children בִנְיָמִ֖ן <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min of Benjamin לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֑ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam; according to their families וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze came forth גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul and the coast גּֽוֹרָלָ֔ם <S%H1486><s%> go-ra-Lam, of their lot בֵּ֚ין <S%H996><s%> bein between בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei between the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei and the children יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. of Joseph

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem הַגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And their border לִפְאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At side צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> tza-Fo-nah on the north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- was from הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> hai-yar-Den; was from Jordan וְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef to the side יְרִיח֜וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-ri-Cho of Jericho מִצָּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon, on the north וְעָלָ֤ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah side and went up בָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> va-Har through the mountains יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, westward; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹּֽצְאֹתָ֔יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the goings out מִדְבַּ֖רָה <S%H4057><s%> mid-Ba-rah thereof were at the wilderness בֵּ֥ית beit אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H1007><s%> 'A-ven. of Bethaven

וְעָבַר֩ <S%H5674><s%> ve-'a-Var went over מִשָּׁ֨ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham there הַגְּב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border ל֗וּזָה <S%H3870><s%> Lu-zah, from thence toward Luz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef to the side ל֙וּזָה֙ <S%H3870><s%> lu-zah of Luz נֶ֔גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah, southward הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <S%H1008><s%> 'El; which [is] Bethel וְיָרַ֤ד <S%H3381><s%> ve-ya-Rad descended הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border עַטְר֣וֹת at-Rot אַדָּ֔ר <S%H5853><s%> 'ad-Dar, to Atarothadar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- near הָהָ֕ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har near the hill אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִנֶּ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> min-Ne-gev that [lieth] on the south side לְבֵית־ le-veit- חֹר֖וֹן <S%H1032><s%> cho-Ron Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <S%H8481><s%> tach-Ton. of the nether

וְתָאַ֣ר <S%H8388><s%> ve-ta-'Ar was drawn הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul And the border וְנָסַ֨ב <S%H5437><s%> ve-na-Sav [thence] and compassed לִפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> lif-'at- the corner יָ֜ם <S%H3220><s%> yam of the sea נֶ֗גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah, southward מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָהָר֙ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har from the hill אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- that פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [lieth] before בֵית־ veit- חֹרוֹן֮ <S%H1032><s%> cho-rOn Bethhoron נֶגְבָּה֒ <S%H5045><s%> neg-Bah southward; וְהָיָה ve-ha-yah כוְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become קתֹֽצְאֹתָ֗יו <S%H8444><s%> to-tze-'o-Tav, and the goings out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about קִרְיַת־ kir-yat- בַּ֙עַל֙ <S%H7154><s%> ba-'al thereof were at Kirjathbaal הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> hi he קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat יְעָרִ֔ים <S%H7157><s%> ye-'a-Rim, which [is] Kirjathjearim עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir a city בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> pe-'at- quarter יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> Yam. this [was] the west

וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> u-fe-'at- quarter נֶ֕גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Neg-bah And the south מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh [was] from the end קִרְיַ֣ת kir-Yat יְעָרִ֑ים <S%H7157><s%> ye-'a-Rim; of Kirjathjearim וְיָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza went out הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> hag-ge-Vul and the border יָ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> Yam-mah, on the west וְיָצָ֕א <S%H3318><s%> ve-ya-Tza and went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מַעְיַ֖ן <S%H4599><s%> ma'-Yan to the well מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> mei of waters נֶפְתּֽוֹחַ׃ <S%H5318><s%> nef-To-ach. of Nephtoah
